people.name: Circle in the Square Theatre
people.description: The Circle in the Square Theatre is a Broadway theatre in midtown Manhattan at 235 West 50th Street in the Paramount Plaza building.

people.name: William Goldman
people.description: William Goldman  is an American novelist, playwright, and screenwriter.

people.name: Anna Katharine Green
people.description: Anna Katharine Green  was an American poet and novelist.

people.name: Ursula Torday
people.description: Ursula Torday /ˈtɔːrˌdeɪ/ , was a British writer of some 60 gothic, romance and mystery novels from 1935 to 1982.

people.name: Gwendoline Butler
people.description: Gwendoline Butler, née Williams  was a British writer of mystery fiction and romance novels since 1956, she also used the pseudonym Jennie Melville.

people.name: Frances Burney
people.description: For the playwright Frances Burney , niece of the novelist, see Frances Burney.

people.name: John Bell
people.description: Sir John Irving Bell GBE FRS FMedSci FREng  is a Canadian–British immunologist and geneticist.

people.name: Sarah Mason
people.description: Sarah Mason  is a British novelist of romance novels since 2002.
